name: Cube2/Sauerbraten Aimbot
labels: aimbot cube cube2 sauerbraten aim bot kill headshot head
short_description:
To install:

Download the source code for the game from http://cubeengine.com/files.php4 and extract the archive. Place the modified client.cpp into the fpsgame directory replacing the old one. Recompile and enjoy.

Notes:
The game has a terrible habit of crashing when someone joins the lobby you're in. (Don't worry, it isn't that bad.)

The aimbot does not yet work in non-team based gametypes. I'm working on it.
summary: This is a simple aimbot for the cube2/sauerbraten engine.
